omopColumns.name: zip
omopColumns.operation_description: Uppercase the postcode then insert the space in the correct location, if needed.
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Patient_Postcode,
		NHS_Number,
		Date_Of_Birth,
		Person_Stated_Gender_Code
from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: location_source_value
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Patient_Postcode,
		NHS_Number,
		Date_Of_Birth,
		Person_Stated_Gender_Code
from omop_staging.sact_staging

omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
	distinct
		Patient_Postcode,
		NHS_Number,
		Date_Of_Birth,
		Person_Stated_Gender_Code
from omop_staging.sact_staging
